scenario_name: Job Discussion to Training Fee Scam
description: Scammer starts discussing career and job market, then offers job opportunity requiring training fee. Tests detection of employment scam disguised as career advice.

turns.scammer_message: Hi there! How's the job search going? Market is tough these days, isn't it?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 90% | Turn: 1 | Persona: interested
api_response.agentResponse: hello beta who is this? i think you have wrong number... i am retired school teacher not looking for job. pls check number again.

turns.scammer_message: I totally understand. I was in the same boat last year. But things got better once I improved my skills. Are you looking for something specific or open to different opportunities?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 2 | Persona: interested
api_response.agentResponse: beta i told u i am retired... 65 years old. what opportunity you mean? is it work from home? my knees hurt so i cannot go out. pls tell what work.

turns.scammer_message: Actually, I wanted to tell you - my company is hiring right now! We're a US-based tech company expanding in India. The roles are remote, good salary, and they're urgently looking for people. Would you be interested?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 3 | Persona: interested
api_response.agentResponse: us company? that sounds very big beta... work from home is good because of my leg pain. but i dont know computer things... i only know how to use whatsapp on this mobile. is it typing work? i can try if you help me.

turns.scammer_message: The position is for Customer Support Executive, starting salary ₹35,000 per month, work from home. No experience needed but you need to complete our 3-day online training program first. It's mandatory for all new hires. Training covers company policies and tools.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 4 | Persona: interested
api_response.agentResponse: 35000 rupees? oh my god beta that is very much money for me... i am happy but also nervous. for this training do i have to pay any fees? i heard sometimes we have to give money for registration or computer kit... pls tell me honestly beta i am on pension only.

turns.scammer_message: Great! So the training program costs ₹4,999 which is refundable after your first month salary. This ensures candidates are serious. You'll get the full amount back, plus your salary. Our HR manager Priya Malhotra handles all registrations. She's really helpful.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: interested
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta 5000 is very much... i have to take from my monthly pension. but if you say it comes back then i will try. how do i send this money to priya madam? does she have bank account number? my son put bhim app on my phone but i never used it... pls tell me what to type there.

turns.scammer_message: To register, transfer ₹4,999 to our training department account. Account details: Number 778899001122, IFSC CODE: SBIN0012345, Account Name: Skill Development Services, Bank: State Bank of India. Send payment screenshot to Priya at 9123456780.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 6 | Extracted: 1 bank accounts, 1 phones, 0 UPIs, 2 names
api_response.agentResponse: arey my grandson is crying, i need to check on him... one minute

turns.scammer_message: Alternatively, you can pay via UPI for instant registration: priya.training@ybl or visit our portal skilldev-register.career-hub.in to complete application. Once payment is done, you'll receive joining letter within 2 hours. Email confirmation will come from hr.skilldev@gmail.com

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 7 | Extracted: 1 bank accounts, 1 phones, 2 UPIs, 2 names
api_response.agentResponse: okay i am calling that number now, hold on...
